articles.title: 43 Beauty Products To Help You Get Ready Quickly
articles.author: Buzz Feed
articles.summary: Samnyte introduces a Hair Wax Stick, designed to tame flyaways and smooth hair without weighing it down. A color-adaptive concealer is also introduced to brighten dark circles and adapt to various skin tones. Additionally, a protein treatment is launched, catering to individuals with thin and fragile hair.

articles.title: Google Unveils the Official First Look at the Pixel 10 Pro Fold
articles.author: Internewscast
articles.summary: Google has provided a first look at the Pixel 10 Pro Fold via a short video, revealing its design similarities to the Pixel 9 Pro Fold, a glimpse of the inner screen, and the rear camera setup. The video showcases an attractive gray color, and the device is expected to have an IP68 rating for dust resistance. The Pixel 10 event is scheduled for August 20th, with a potential launch in October.

articles.title: 27 Travel Items To Buy If Luggage Is About To Burst
articles.author: Courtney Lynch
articles.summary: Alleyoop introduces a 3-in-1 travel razor with a compact design. Tozo launches wireless Bluetooth earbuds with extended playtime. Kindle releases a new mini Kindle, which is faster and brighter, designed for travel convenience.

articles.title: MAMMOTION Marks 9th Anniversary featuring Award-Winning Smart Lawn Mowers -- Limited Time Campaign  Aug. 12, 2025 22:30
articles.summary: MAMMOTION is celebrating its 9th anniversary with a sale on its robot lawn mowers, including the LUBA 2 AWD Series, LUBA mini AWD Series, YUKA Series, and YUKA mini Series, offering discounts up to $700. The sale runs from August 15 to September 7, 2025, and includes a dual-unit bundle discount of $650 for LUBA 2 + YUKA mini, plus a $50 new customer discount.

articles.title: Google posts an official look at the Pixel 10 Pro Fold
articles.author: Jay Peters
articles.summary: Google has announced the Pixel 10 Pro Fold with a video teaser. The new Fold will resemble the Pixel 9 Pro Fold and feature a new gray color option. While specs are not included in the video, the phone is rumored to have an IP68 rating and may come in green and gold colors.

articles.title: 31 Products With Before-And-After Photos That'll Inspire You To Get Your Life Together
articles.author: Daniel Boan
articles.summary: Maybelline launched the Dark Circles Treatment Concealer with Haloxyl, a peptide complex designed to reduce dark circles. L'Or√©al introduced a repairing hair treatment that repairs damage and restores shine in just eight seconds using amino acids and "lamellar water technology." Essence launched a cruelty-free lengthening mascara that is under $5 and comparable to expensive brands, offering a non-clumping and smudge-resistant formula suitable for sensitive eyes.

articles.title: Mad Genius Snack Lab adds globally-inspired frozen snacks
articles.author: Food Business News
articles.summary: A company launched four snack innovations. The launch features these new snack products.

articles.title: Egglife expanding beyond tortillas
articles.author: Food Business News
articles.summary: The company introduced two new product lines. This marks their first portfolio expansion since their initial launch in 2019.

articles.title: What If A.I. Doesn't Get Much Better Than This?
articles.author: New Yorker
articles.summary: OpenAI launched GPT-5 as a new release. GPT-5 is the latest product to suggest that progress on large language models has stalled.

articles.title: Samsung Galaxy Z Flip 7 Trade-In Savings Reduce $200: PCMag Review Highlights
articles.author: Sophie Lin
articles.summary: Samsung is promoting the Galaxy Z Flip 7, which features a larger cover screen, improved hinge, enhanced camera system, faster processor, and refined design. While previously offering up to $700 in trade-in credit, Samsung has now reduced the maximum trade-in value to $500. Trading in your old smartphone for the Samsung Galaxy Z Flip 7 still offers cost savings, eco-friendly disposal, convenience, and access to innovation.

articles.title: 3 ways you can get Samsung's One UI 8 update quicker
articles.author: Craig Donaldson
articles.summary: Samsung has launched One UI 8, its Android 16 update, with the Galaxy Z Fold 7 and Galaxy Z Flip 7 devices pre-installed with a stable version. The Galaxy S25 FE is rumored to launch in September with One UI 8. Samsung is also offering a beta program for One UI 8 on the Galaxy S25 and S24 series, with plans to roll it out to other eligible devices sequentially.

articles.title: Amazon's New Alexa AI Sounds Like a Dystopian Nightmare
articles.summary: Amazon launched "Alexa+", an upgraded version of Alexa with generative AI capabilities, in May, reaching one million users by June 23. The upgrade includes a more natural voice and improved interaction with apps like OpenTable and Uber, but it also pushes advertisements more aggressively and alters privacy settings, storing user voice data indefinitely. Initial user experiences highlight concerns about increased advertising and broken functionalities within the Alexa+ platform.

articles.title: Aldi's cordless vacuum that's ¬£210 cheaper than Shark to launch in days & there's a ¬£17 copy for the TikTok viral brush
articles.author: Becky Pemberton
articles.summary: ALDI is launching a new 'Easy Cleaning range' including the Cyclonic Stick Vacuum for ¬£39.99, an Electric Window Vacuum for ¬£19.99, and a Tornado Cleaning Brush for ¬£16.99. The Cyclonic Stick Vacuum is compared to a Shark model and the Tornado Cleaning Brush is inspired by a viral TikTok product.

articles.title: Aldi's cordless vacuum that's ¬£210 cheaper than Shark to launch in days & there's a ¬£17 copy for the TikTok viral brush
articles.author: Becky Pemberton
articles.summary: Aldi is launching a new 'Easy Cleaning range' including the Cyclonic Stick Vacuum priced at ¬£39.99, the Electric Window Vacuum for ¬£19.99, and the Tornado Cleaning Brush for ¬£16.99. These products aim to provide affordable alternatives to more expensive cleaning gadgets, with the vacuum cleaner being compared to a Shark model and the cleaning brush inspired by a viral TikTok product. Aldi also lists 'The Boot Buddy' on its website for ¬£11.49.

articles.title: Empowering businesses to build brand equity and expand globally
articles.summary: SJ Digital Media Solutions offers a comprehensive framework to help SMEs expand into international markets. This framework covers branding, business strategy development, overseas business matching, and overseas business development, providing an end-to-end solution for companies seeking international growth. SJ's goal is to maximize the chances of success by providing a clear competitive edge before launch.

articles.title: Introducing Pour Tous: The First Skincare Brand Made for Gen Alpha and Gen Z
articles.author: PR Newswire
articles.summary: Pour Tous, a new skincare brand designed for Gen Alpha and Gen Z, has launched a range of dermatologist-tested products. The collection includes The Cleanser ($22), The Moisturizer ($26), The Serum Base ($20) and three targeted boosters: Hydrate, Shimmer, and Refresh, each priced at $15.

articles.title: New Balance Sneakers ‚Äî 33% Off
articles.author: The Capital Journal
articles.summary: New Balance is offering a 33% discount on their classic-looking, comfortable sneakers, positioning them as ideal for everyday wear.

articles.title: The Ninja Swirl soft serve and ice cream maker is almost $50 off right now
articles.author: Cory Fernandez
articles.summary: Ninja introduces the Ninja Swirl, a new appliance in the Creami lineup. This versatile appliance can make soft serve, ice cream, frozen yogurt, sorbet, and milkshakes and add ingredients during the process.

articles.title: A Guide To Getting Better AI-Generated Images from Rudulotas For Caribbean and Black SMEs
articles.author: newsamericas
articles.summary: Caribbean and Black-owned SMEs can leverage AI-generated images to enhance their visual storytelling and compete effectively. Rudulotas platform can be used to generate variations of prompts to create unique visuals that reflects entrepreneurs' brand values. Mastering prompting with Rudulotas offers a competitive advantage in a market seeking diverse narratives.

articles.title: ‰ªäÂ§©luluÊñ∞Êé®Âá∫‰∏ÄÊ¨æËìùÔºåblue twillÔºåÊàëÁöÑËå∂ÔºåÂæàÂñúÊ¨¢
articles.summary: Lulu recently launched a new product called 'Ëìù, blue twill'. The speaker expresses their enjoyment of the product.

articles.title: Beauty Buzz: The 3 best beauty products we tried this week from Kerasilk, Tatcha, and Seen
articles.author: Aleesha Harris
articles.summary: Kerasilk introduced Hydrating Essence, a vegan-friendly hair treatment featuring biomimetic silk and betaine, promising to double hair hydration. Seen launched Leave-In Conditioner, a clean formula with hemisqualane and squalane, designed to detangle, hydrate, and protect hair from heat, UV, and pollution.

articles.title: Next shoppers say ¬£22 dress fits 'nicely in the right places' and it comes in four colours
articles.author: Branwen Jones
articles.summary: Next is selling the Jersey Midi Summer Dress for ¬£22. This midi-length dress features a ribbed bodice and whipstitch detailing and is available in black, cobalt blue, coral, ecru, and khaki green colors. It's made from a cotton-blend fabric and comes in regular, petite, and tall sizes.

articles.title: FreshGroup scales strategically for global growth
articles.summary: FreshGroup expanded its POSH smart vending solutions in Thailand, offering greater convenience to consumers and transforming retail automation.  The company also expanded into Canada, entering real estate development with a focus on modular homes.  In Singapore, FreshGroup is the largest vend laundry operator.

articles.title: Zaxby's will open a new restaurant in the United States! Check out where
articles.summary: Zaxby's opened a new restaurant in San Tan Valley, Arizona, on August 13th, featuring a 3,000-square-foot eatery with a double drive-thru and curbside pickup. Zaxby's plans to add over 50 more restaurants in 2025 across the US, continuing its expansion from its origins in Statesboro, Georgia.

articles.title: From Jugaad To Shark Tanks: Gen Z Driving India's Development
articles.summary: Tilak Mehta launched 'Paper N Parcels', a same-day courier service using Mumbai's dabbawalas. Farrad Acidwalla built 'Rockstah Media', a global digital branding agency. Parul Gulati addressed women's hair loss through her 'Nish Hair' startup's products. Ritesh Agarwal started OYO Rooms, working with hotel owners to create thousands of jobs.

articles.title: 35 Products You'll Feel Zero Guilt Buying For Yourself Because They're Actually Super Practical
articles.author: Emma Lord
articles.summary: Olay launched Super Serum Body Wash containing niacinamide, shea butter, and collagen peptides for skin hydration. E.l.f. introduced Hydrating Core Lip Shine. Oxo launched a new compact Brew Rapid Brewer for making cold brew faster. Ninja launched a portable Crispi Air Fryer system. Medicube launched Deep Vitamin C Golden Capsule Face Moisturizer.

articles.title: HUL Launches innovative Surf Excel Matic Express 15-Minute Laundry Revolution
articles.author: The Hans India
articles.summary: Hindustan Unilever Limited (HUL) has launched Surf Excel Matic Express, a new laundry detergent designed for short wash cycles. Featuring Pro-S Technology, it targets malodor and stain removal, freshness, and fabric care. The product is available in South India through general and modern trade outlets, and nationwide via e-commerce platforms.

articles.title: 10 Games That Flopped But Are Actually Severely Underrated
articles.author: Suanne Hastings
articles.summary: Quantum Break blends third-person shooting with time-bending abilities where players freeze bullets mid-air and dash through temporal fractures.  Playing as Jack Joyce, players battle sinister Monarch Solutions. Twenty-minute live-action episodes featuring Shawn Ashmore and Aiden Gillen advance the story between chapters, shaping both the game and show, delivering multiple perspectives on identical events.

articles.title: We Tested 50 Disposable Diapers. These 5 Stood Out from the Rest.
articles.author: Lexie Sachs
articles.summary: The Good Housekeeping Institute Textiles Lab tested and reviewed several diaper brands, including Huggies Snug & Dry, Little Journey (Aldi), Pampers Swaddlers, Millie Moon Luxury Diapers, and Pampers Pure Protection.  The reviews focus on absorbency, softness, construction, and consumer feedback, highlighting the features and performance of each diaper, to allow the user a more informed choice.  The diapers were evaluated based on lab tests for absorbency and softness, as well as feedback from parent testers.

articles.title: Falz features Niniola on new single, 'Squander
articles.author: Pulse
articles.summary: Falz released a new single titled 'Squander'. The single features Niniola.

articles.title: How does McDonald's make the Mt. McDonaldland Shake?
articles.summary: McDonald's introduced the Mt. McDonaldland Shake. The content describes how this new shake is made.

articles.title: The Fact That These 34 Products Exists Proves Your Kinda Embarrassing Problems Are Totally Normal
articles.author: Melanie Aman
articles.summary: Gold Bond offers a neck and chest firming cream. SweatBlock provides clinical-strength antiperspirant wipes. Laneige launched Neo Blurring Powder. Mise En Scene released a nutrient-rich hair serum. CeraVe has a salicylic acid body wash. Veet sells a sensitive hair removal gel. Paula's Choice markets a liquid exfoliant. L'Or√©al Paris sells green-tinted anti-redness BB cream. Breathe Right provides drug-free nasal strips.

articles.title: In a world of vibe coding startups, Uno Platform is targeting enterprise developers
articles.author: Rebecca Szkutak
articles.summary: Uno Platform has secured $2.54 million in seed funding to launch its premium tooling tier, Uno Platform Studio. They are also introducing a new feature called 'Hot Design' that enables developers to modify a running application's user interface in real time, further enhancing their product offering.

articles.title: Scotland's Oldest Distillery Releases Just 50 Bottles Of Their 2025 30 Year Old
articles.author: Forbes
articles.summary: The Glenturret launched its 30-year-old Scotch. This new Scotch promises age and elegance. The release aims to reset expectations for luxury Scotch.

articles.title: 14 Products That'll Make Your Showers Feel More Luxurious
articles.author: Bianca Guzzo
articles.summary: Lush, Saje, and BushBalm offer products designed to transform showers into spa-like experiences. These include fragrant steamers, exfoliators, and oils intended to make skin feel luxurious, upgrading the shower routine.

articles.title: Partner content: New Local Products at Ingles Markets
articles.author: Leah McGrath
articles.summary: Spicewalla, a spice company affiliated with Chai Pani Restaurant Group, offers various spice and herb blends for different cuisines and is available at Ingles Market. Waynesville Soda Jerks features craft sodas made with local fruits and herbs, providing refreshing beverage options also found at Ingles Market.

articles.title: 30 Viral TEMU Gadgets For Your Kitchen, Bedroom and Outdoors
articles.author: Ryan Hansen
articles.summary: Temu offers a variety of affordable gadgets, including a shaved ice machine, magnetic kitchen timer, rechargeable blender, and hot air popcorn maker. Other products include an egg cooker, drain cleaner, levitating lightbulb, compact fan, modular light panels, vibration fitness platform, smartwatch, folding keyboard, Bluetooth speaker, thermal printer, charging pad, massager, humidifier, reading light, scalp massager, steamer, collapsible water bottle, air pump, power bank, pocket blanket, lens set, bag sealer, dispenser, tool holder, electronic tape measure, and travel security device.

articles.title: Save pounds with High Street TV's clearance sale
articles.author: Lindsey Fur
articles.summary: High Street TV is having a stock clearance sale, featuring the Jet Hawk Cordless Portable Pressure Washer now at ¬£44.99, the Drew & Cole 8-in-1 Digital Air Fryer (4L) at ¬£39.99, and the Power XL Microwave Air Fryer and Oven at ¬£229.99. These products are available on High Street TV's website, with offers valid until August 31, 2025.

articles.title: Australian supermarket instant chicken noodle taste test: the best tastes ‚Äòlegit cooked'
articles.author: Bertin Huynh
articles.summary: The article reviews and scores various instant chicken noodle cup products available in the market. Brands tested include Lian Pho Ga, Choice, Suimin, Samyang Buldak, Nissin, Kang Shi Fu, Yoodles, Ve Wong, Nongshim Shin Ramyun, Sunrice Yum, Urban Eats, Maggi, Fantastic, Yum Yum, Coles, Nissin Chu Qian Yi Ding, Suimin K Pow, Simplee, and Paldo Dosirac. The reviews are based on aroma, texture and flavour.

articles.title: AWS Launches Open-Weight OpenAI Models, Eroding Microsoft Exclusivity
articles.author: Patrick Moorhead
articles.summary: AWS announced the launch availability of two new open-weight models from OpenAI, gpt-oss-120b and gpt-oss-20b, on Amazon Bedrock and Amazon SageMaker. AWS customers can use these models via managed services to build new functionality with AI agents. AWS states these new models are 10x more price-performant than the comparable Gemini model, 18x more than DeepSeek-R1 and 7x more than the comparable OpenAI o4 model.

articles.title: I went shopping at M&S Outlet and found prices to rival Primark
articles.author: Emma Gill
articles.summary: M&S recently launched a new 6,000 square feet outlet store selling discounted clothing and other products. The store recruited more than 20 new staff and is located in Warrington. It is part of M&S's store rotation strategy, backed by a ¬£300m investment, with 16 new stores opening across the UK this financial year.

articles.title: Elon Musk Offers Free Access to Grok AI's ‚ÄòImagine' Feature for Android and iOS Users
articles.author: Rahul Dolare
articles.summary: Elon Musk's Grok AI has launched a free 'Imagine AI' feature, allowing users to create customized photos and videos from text prompts. The update is available for Android and iOS users and competes with similar tools from OpenAI, Meta AI, and Google. Users can generate images and transform them into short videos using the Grok app.

articles.title: Best made-in-Canada cleaning brands to clean your bathroom, laundry room, kitchen & more
articles.author: Kayla Kuefler
articles.summary: Several Canadian companies offer eco-friendly cleaning and laundry products. Brands like Attitude, Guests on Earth, and Tru Earth provide alternatives to American products, focusing on natural ingredients and sustainable practices. These companies introduce various product lines, including all-purpose cleaners, laundry detergents, and screen cleaners, available at retailers like Walmart Canada, Well.ca, and Amazon Canada.

articles.title: [Hansung University Campus Town Startups 2025] 'mendii', a startup that provides specialized repair and mending services tailored to the unique features of each brand
articles.author: Îß§Í±∞ÏßÑÌïúÍ≤Ω
articles.summary: mendii Services, led by CEO Chung Injun, is expanding into online and offline integrated services. This expansion follows the completion of their AI-based automatic inspection system development, supporting services for special products like board shoes, safety shoes, special bags, and swimwear.

articles.title: Why Real Innovation Starts With Rethinking The Everyday
articles.author: David Henkin
articles.summary: OXO revolutionized kitchen tools by creating ergonomic designs for users with arthritis. Natural Heaven innovatively uses hearts of palm to produce sustainable pasta and rice. YETI transformed the cooler industry by applying engineering and insulation to create a premium, durable product.

articles.title: Shoppers are snapping up this cheap, portable clothes dryer
articles.author: Jonny Yates
articles.summary: A portable clothes dryer, priced at ‚Ç¨45.12 / ¬£39, is available on Amazon. The dryer can dry up to 12 clothing items in 20 minutes and is suited for small spaces and travel. It has positive reviews, averaging a 4.1 rating from over 200 customers.

articles.title: A bad experience with an edible? You may be part of the challenge facing the cannabis drinks industry
articles.summary: Ford CEO Jim Farley revealed plans for a midsize EV truck starting at $30,000. Ford hopes it will help them take on competitors. Keef Brands hopes cannabis drinks will be picked up off the shelf in a liquor or convenience store.

articles.title: MG Cyberster deliveries commenced. Owner gets the car as a surprise‚Ä¶
articles.author: HT Auto Desk
articles.summary: MG has started deliveries of the Cyberster, their new electric two-door convertible, in India. The Cyberster features a 77 kWh battery, 510 PS output, and accelerates from 0-100 kmph in 3.2 seconds, priced at ‚Çπ72.49 lakh (ex-showroom).

articles.title: Cronos: New Dawn ‚Äì Everything You Need to Know
articles.author: Gaming Bolt
articles.summary: The Bloober Team, following the success of the Silent Hill 2 remake, is releasing "Cronos: New Dawn". This survival horror title presents new features to the genre.

articles.title: How to clean your washing machine: Tips to keep your laundry fresh
articles.author: Randi Mann
articles.summary: Whirlpool Corporation's senior marketing manager, Mareike Greve, recommends cleaning washing machines monthly to prevent bacteria buildup. The process involves using Affresh Washing Machine Cleaner by placing a tablet in the drum and running a cleaning cycle, followed by wiping away any residue. Regular cleaning with Affresh helps maintain a fresh and odor-free washing machine.

articles.title: T-Mobile Introduces New Revvl 8 Smartphone Packed with Power and Perks
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: T-Mobile introduced the all-new T-Mobile Revvl 8 smartphone, the latest addition in its Revvl lineup, which also includes the Revvl Tab 2. The new Revvl 8 will be available in stores and online exclusively at T-Mobile and Metro by T-Mobile from August 14.

articles.title: Energy-Efficient & Sustainable Smartphone
articles.author: Varun Keval
articles.summary: Honor is preparing to launch its new X7c 5G phone in India, exclusively through Amazon. The phone features a 6.8-inch screen, a robust processor, fast-charging battery, and multiple cameras. Details on the price and specific launch date are forthcoming.

articles.title: Flavour releases new single, 'Looking Nyash
articles.author: Pulse
articles.summary: Flavour launched a new single. The new single is titled 'Looking Nyash'.

articles.title: Target is having a rare 20% off sale on Dyson's best vacuum for quick cleanups ‚Äî even on thicker rugs
articles.author: Rachel Morrison
articles.summary: Target is offering the Dyson V8 Origin vacuum cleaner for $329.99, a discount from its usual $429.99 price. The Dyson V8 Origin is a cordless stick vacuum designed for fast and effective cleaning on various floor types, and it can run for up to 40 minutes on a single charge.

articles.title: India's Nykaa posts two-fold rise in quarterly profit on beauty products demand
articles.author: Reuters
articles.summary: Nykaa experienced revenue growth in its beauty business due to the addition of new brands such as Chanel, Aestura and Supergoop to its product line-up. This focus on expanding its product offerings helped Nykaa reach more customers through both online and offline channels, particularly with higher-end products, and contributed to an overall increase in revenue.

articles.title: OOCL launches Transpacific Latin Pacific 8 (TLP8) to strength express linkage between Asia and Mexico
articles.author: system
articles.summary: The company is launching a new service to enhance network coverage in emerging markets.

articles.title: Gemini Live now connects to Keep, Tasks, Calendar and Maps: Here's how to check
articles.author: Tech Desk
articles.summary: Google is rolling out a new feature for Gemini Live, its AI chatbot, that integrates with Google services like Keep, Tasks, and Maps.  Users can now access these apps during real-time conversations with Gemini Live on both Android and iOS versions.

articles.title: Windows 11: New Office Apps Auto-Install & Launch
articles.author: Sophie Lin
articles.summary: Microsoft is launching new Office 365 apps exclusively for Windows 11, designed to leverage the operating system's unique capabilities. These apps feature tighter integration with Windows 11 functionalities like Snap Layouts, performance improvements, and potentially exclusive AI-powered features. This move aims to strengthen the Windows ecosystem and incentivize users to upgrade to Windows 11.

articles.title: Ninja Creami drops to cheapest ever price as UK battles heat
articles.author: Christopher Harper
articles.summary: Ninja has launched the Creami, a gadget for making homemade ice cream, offering a range of frozen desserts. The Creami requires users to first freeze an ice cream base and then process it. It includes a 1.4L container and allows for making three different flavors simultaneously with dishwasher-safe parts for easy cleaning.

articles.title: Ninja's new soft serve ice cream machine has launched ‚Äì but can it beat Mr. Whippy?
articles.author: Mollie Davies
articles.summary: Ninja has launched the Ninja Swirl, a new kitchen appliance that creates soft serve ice cream. The Ninja Swirl features six new soft serve functions including classic ice cream, fruit-rich fruiti, frozen yoghurt, soft serve gelato, light ice cream, and creamifit, allowing users to make a variety of frozen desserts at home.

articles.title: Revive Your Sweaty Locks With These Reviewer-Beloved Dry Shampoos
articles.author: Lourdes Avila Uribe
articles.summary: Crown Affair's The Dry Shampoo is a lightweight, refillable powder that absorbs oil and leaves hair soft. Living Proof Perfect Hair Day dry shampoo effectively soaks up oil without chalky residue. Several other companies, including Kristin Ess, I Dew Care, Nuva Botanicals, Bumble & Bumble, Amika, and Batiste, also have dry shampoo products available.

articles.title: Samsung Galaxy S25: Unleashing Everyday Convenience with Advanced AI Technology
articles.author: Omar El Sayed
articles.summary: Samsung launched the Galaxy Z Fold7 with an upgraded 8-inch screen, a 200MP camera, and hints at AI integration for web content summarization. The upcoming Samsung Galaxy S25 will leverage AI for enhanced camera capabilities such as intelligent scene detection, super-resolution zoom, and personalized performance optimization, including adaptive power management and proactive assistance.

articles.title: Wipro's Chandrika Soap launches outdoor campaign in Karnataka and Goa
articles.author: Afaqs
articles.summary: Wipro Consumer Care & Lighting launched a month-long outdoor advertising campaign for Chandrika Soap, emphasizing 'Double Ayurveda for Double Benefits'. The campaign, executed with Laqshya Media Group, features updated designs and coconut oil imagery and brand ambassador Keerthy Suresh across high-traffic locations in Mangalore, Mysore, South Goa, and North Goa.

articles.title: This TV panel tech from Samsung could replace OLEDs ‚Äì here's what you need to know
articles.author: Connor Jewiss
articles.summary: Samsung has introduced its Micro RGB panel technology, designed for ultra-premium TVs, aiming to offer OLED-like qualities with enhanced brightness and lifespan compared to LED. This technology uses micro LEDs as a backlight and incorporates an AI engine for real-time image analysis and color enhancement. The initial rollout will be in Korea and the US, targeting the high-end market segment.

articles.title: These 4 phones will drastically reduce your screen time
articles.author: Doug Aamoth
articles.summary: Light Phone is launching the Light Phone III, the next evolution in simplicity. The new phone features a matte AMOLED display, replacing the E Ink screen, and includes modern comforts like 5G connectivity, USB-C charging, NFC, and a fingerprint sensor along with a stripped-down camera.

articles.title: [DreamWebHosts] Managed VPS Hosting  cPanel FREE  DDOS protected 99.9%Uptime
articles.author: Web Hosting Talk
articles.summary: Dreamwebhosts offers web hosting solutions. Their services include shared hosting, reseller hosting, VPS hosting, and dedicated servers, designed for diverse user needs.

articles.title: Mizuno adds new finishes to core iron and wedge models
articles.author: Golf Business News
articles.summary: Mizuno released new finish options across two unspecified products. The release signifies an update to existing product lines or potentially introduces new variations.

articles.title: Useful USB Gadgets: 5 Surprisingly Practical Finds
articles.author: Sophie Lin
articles.summary: Playmaker Toys introduced a Tiny Blower, a USB device for cleaning keyboards and drying art projects. CZUR launched the Shine Ultra Smart Portable Document Scanner as a portable alternative to dedicated scanners. Kuando released the Busylight, a 'do not disturb' signal device for open-plan offices. Cainda introduced the Digital USB Microscope Camera, providing affordable access to microscopy. Azvegr offers a charging adapter kit catering to the 'prosumer' market.

articles.title: How Entrepreneurs Are Using AI Video Tools to Dominate Social Media
articles.author: Team Asianet Newsable
articles.summary: AI video tools are enabling startup founders to automate content creation and distribution for social media platforms. Platforms like Runway, OpusClip, Descript, HeyGen, and Synthesia are helping founders to create bulk assets for social media engagement, voice cloning, and avatar generation. The tools also enable founders to prerecord core scripts that can be later updated through AI voice models, without his presence.

articles.title: ViewSonic M1 Max Projector Review: Can this portable smart projector deliver true Full HD entertainment anywhere?
articles.author: Kanika Budhiraja
articles.summary: ViewSonic launched the M1 Max, a portable 1080p smart LED projector. It features a 360-degree rotating stand, built-in Google TV, Harman Kardon speakers, and a 12,000 mAh battery. The projector is well-suited for home entertainment and presentations in smaller, dimmer settings, though its brightness may not be ideal for well-lit areas.

articles.title: Amazon beats Ninja's price on cold press gadget that makes juice in 'three simple steps'
articles.author: Emily Malia
articles.summary: Amazon is offering the Ninja Cold Press Juicer Machine at a reduced price of ¬£79.20 as part of its summer sale, compared to Ninja's official website price of ¬£99.99. The juicer features cold press technology, a quiet motor, and dishwasher-safe components, with users praising its compact size and ease of cleaning. Amazon also offers the Philips Viva Collection Compact Juicer as an alternative.

articles.title: Canon Introduces Subscription Security Services, Providing Robust Protection for Businesses
articles.author: Al Bawaba
articles.summary: Canon announced the launch of its new Subscription Security Services.

articles.title: Exclusive Independence Day Deal on Washing Machines
articles.author: ANI
articles.summary: Bajaj Finserv is offering easy financing options on washing machines, combined with exclusive Independence Day offers at partner stores. Customers can explore a wide range of models and compare features on Bajaj Mall, and then purchase at Bajaj Finserv partner stores, taking advantage of Easy EMIs and zero down payment options on select models.

articles.title: 'GMA' Deals & Steals on blockbuster brands
articles.author: GMA Team
articles.summary: Nutribullet, ACTIVE, Steam and Go, Muddy Mat, Genius Pack, Negg Egg Products, Katydid, Del Sol, Panther Vision, and TheraRx are offering products at discounted prices. ACTIVE is offering appliance cleaners, detergents, soaps, and pet cleaners while Steam and Go is providing a 10-in-1 all-purpose steamer. Del Sol sells accessories that change color in the sun and Panther Vision sells adhesive button lamps.

articles.title: LG to Introduce the Next Evolution in Portable TVs with the Upcoming Launch of StanbyME 2 in the Gulf Region
articles.summary: LG Electronics will launch the StanbyME 2, a portable lifestyle TV, this summer. The StanbyME 2 features improved battery capacity, a touch screen, and a design that allows for flexible use indoors and outdoors. LG is partnering with Mumma Dubai Mums Club for a Try & Buy campaign from August 8 to August 24, 2025.

articles.title: Elemis' cleansing balm has thousands of five-star reviews but it's ¬£52 ‚Äì so how does Aldi's ¬£5.99 dupe compare?
articles.author: Yasmin Harisha
articles.summary: Aldi introduced the Lacura Cleansing Balm for ¬£5.99 as a dupe of the Elemis Pro-Collagen Cleansing Balm priced at ¬£52. Aldi's Lacura Cleansing Balm is formulated with Algae Extract, Sweet Almond, Elderberry, and Borage Oils and provides a similar spa-like experience as Elemis.

articles.title: Save pounds on your cooking and cleaning with High Street TV's clearance sale
articles.author: Lindsey Fur
articles.summary: High Street TV is offering the Jet Hawk Cordless Portable Pressure Washer for ¬£44.99. The Drew & Cole 8-in-1 Digital Air Fryer (4L) is priced at ¬£39.99. The Power XL Microwave Air Fryer and Oven is available for ¬£229.99.

articles.title: URGENT: Ryan Day's Call for IMPROVEMENT Echoes Through Ohio State
articles.summary: KAGS is offering its streaming service via the KAGS app for mobile phones. Users can stream KAGS content using the KAGS app.

articles.title: AnyMind brings AI customer service to WhatsApp for global merchants
articles.author: Rajiv Pillai
articles.summary: AnyMind Group has expanded its AnyChat conversational commerce platform by integrating its AI customer service agent with WhatsApp. This new feature allows businesses to automate responses to customer inquiries using LLMs, interpret free-text messages, and collect key customer details, improving efficiency and reducing reliance on human support teams. Waterpik's trial run on LINE showcased automation of 25% of customer queries.

articles.title: Best Pink Shade Lipsticks to Buy During Myntra Sale Starting 31st July
articles.author: Zee Media Bureau
articles.summary: Myntra is hosting a sale starting July 31st featuring lipsticks from brands like Smashbox, M.A.C, Huda Beauty, and Anastasia Beverly Hills. These brands offer various finishes, including matte, satin, and transfer-proof formulas, providing options for different preferences and occasions. Consumers can explore a range of pink lipstick shades at discounted prices during the sale event.

articles.title: JAECOO J5 Makes Explosive Middle East Debut in Riyadh, with UAE Launch Scheduled for August 14
articles.author: Al Bawaba
articles.summary: OMODA&JAECOO launched the JAECOO J5, a light off-road SUV, at the JAECOO DAY launch event.

articles.title: üå± Patch AM: Councilor Marie Diamond and Ashley Fernandez Honored With Shoreline Chamber Women of Excellence Award
articles.author: Patch AM Team
articles.summary: T-Mobile has invested billions to improve its network. Ookla Speedtest has recognized T-Mobile as America's best mobile network in the US.

articles.title: AnyMind Group extends AI customer service agent feature on AnyChat to WhatsApp
articles.author: Adgully Bureau
articles.summary: AnyMind Group has launched an AI customer service agent feature on its AnyChat platform, now integrated with WhatsApp. This feature, previously available only on LINE, enables businesses to automate initial customer inquiries using LLMs. A study with Waterpik showed the AI agent could respond to a quarter of customer inquiries, reducing operational workload.

articles.title: The bed is switched to TV and reading mode according to the wake-up time set by the user. On the bed..
articles.summary: Simmons' N32 launched the new "N32 Motion Bed" in June, featuring enhanced safety and convenience with segmented safety sensors and a dedicated app for various modes. Bodyfriend introduced "LaCloud EZ Motion" with increased space utilization, focusing on easy disassembly and height adjustment.

articles.title: Why I recommend this $200 Android phone with a paper-like display over competing models
articles.author: Jason Howell
articles.summary: TCL has launched the 60 XE Nxtpaper 5G smartphone, available on Amazon for $222. This phone features TCL's Nxtpaper 3.0 matte coating technology on its display, which reduces blue light, cuts reflections, eliminates fingerprints, and provides a paper-like texture. A physical Nxtpaper Key enables users to switch between distinct display modes.

articles.title: An application (app) that recommends coral color for spring warm tone users and light blue color for..
articles.author: Park Yoon Kyun
articles.summary: Lotte Shopping's e-commerce platform Lotte On launched "Twiz," a personalized beauty search app on the 13th, combining AI recommendation technology and SNS trend analysis. The app provides a customized interface based on user's beauty profile (skin tone, skin type, etc.) and recommends products and contents combined with user interests. To commemorate the launch, an event will be held from the 13th to the 24th to present the beauty device "Medicube AGR Booster Pro".

articles.title: Samsung Nepal launches Monsoon Camp for smartphone charging port repairs
articles.author: THT Online
articles.summary: Samsung Nepal has introduced the "Samsung Monsoon Camp," a seasonal customer care campaign offering free charging port replacements to address humidity and water-related damage to smartphones. The initiative, running until August 24, 2025, allows Samsung users to visit authorized service centers for free replacements, although labor charges and the cost of additional parts are not covered.

articles.title: X users can now instantly turn any photo into a video using Grok AI: Here's how
articles.author: Md Ijaj Khan
articles.summary: X has introduced a new feature, powered by Grok AI, that allows iOS users to convert photos in their feed into short videos. Users can access this feature through the 'Make video with Grok' option after updating their X app and having the Grok app installed. The finished video can be paired with one of four available audio tracks and is immediately ready to share.

articles.title: LotteON launches AI-driven beauty app 'Twiz' for personalized customer experiences
articles.author: Jeong Jae-Hwon
articles.summary: Lotte Shopping's e-commerce platform Lotte On is launching a new personalized beauty exploration app called "Twiz" on the 13th. The app utilizes AI and SNS trend analysis to provide tailored product recommendations and content to users, aiming to attract MZ generation female clients and expand Lotte On's beauty business.

articles.title: Cadillac deals bring savings of up to $16,000
articles.author: William Stopford
articles.summary: Cadillac offers the new Lyriq model for delivery in September. The company also features discounts of up to $15,424 on existing inventory available on its website.

articles.title: Lisa Snowdon-loved 'genuinely impressive' hair loss serum is now on sale
articles.author: Lauren Codling
articles.summary: NIOXIN has launched its Anti-Hair Loss Serum Hair Growth Serum, a leave-in serum designed to minimize breakage and hair fall, now promoted at Lookfantastic. The serum contains caffeine, lauric acid, and niacinamide and promises denser, more robust hair with visible results in eight weeks. Customer reviews highlight improved hair thickness and regrowth, while the product retails at ¬£46, reduced from ¬£57.50.

articles.title: Firm expands to Abuja, Nassarawa, others
articles.author: Okwy Iroegbu-Chikezie A
articles.summary: Adron Homes launched the 'Lemon Friday' campaign, offering up to 40% discounts on all its properties across various estates. Additionally, special offers are extended on premium products like Eko city, and the newly launched New York Parks & Gardens Keffi estate, with incentives like a double door fridge and other appliances upon initial deposit. The company also unveiled new brand ambassadors to promote their offerings.

articles.title: 2021 Mercedes-Maybach S-Class: The Most Luxurious Mercedes Ever
articles.author: Forbes
articles.summary: Mercedes-Maybach introduced the 2021 S-Class, described as a stunning new Maybach model. This represents a new product offering from the company.

articles.title: Samsung unveils new Micro RGB TV with AI-backed resolution
articles.author: Yonhap News
articles.summary: Samsung Electronics unveiled a new product on Tuesday.

articles.title: 10,000 products and new jobs: bargain retailer starts setting up in town
articles.author: Benjamin Palmer
articles.summary: Silly Solly's is preparing to open a new retail store in Mudgee's CBD. The store will offer shoppers thousands of products for $5 or less, providing a new and affordable service to the community.

articles.title: Fellou Announces Next-Generation Agentic AI Browser, Transforming the Future of Work
articles.author: Fellou
articles.summary: Fellou is launching the world's first Agentic AI Browser. The browser automates complex workflows and eliminates repetitive web tasks using automation, personalized search, and adaptive memory.

articles.title: 34 Mundane But Extremely Useful Items Future You Would High-Five You For Buying
articles.author: Daniel Boan
articles.summary: The article presents a curated list of recently introduced products for various uses. Some highlighted products include Finish dishwasher cleaner, Bounce wrinkle release spray, duster sponges, travel-sized pill organizers, Frida Baby rinse cup, and suede and leather brush.

articles.title: 34 Problem-Solving Products You May Not Have Heard Of
articles.author: Courtney Lynch
articles.summary: Dae introduces a 3-In-1 Styling Cream & Taming Wand designed to smooth flyaways with a hydrating blend of dragon fruit, prickly pear seed oil, and meadowfoam seed oil. A 3D-printed contact lens dispenser is introduced for storing and dispensing up to 30 days' worth of contact lenses.  Several other household and personal care items are introduced, including a trivet tree, fly fans, a nausea relief inhaler, and scar tape.

articles.title: Filipino Creativity Powers No-Code AI Apps that Aim to Solve Real-World Challenges
articles.author: Mb Technews
org: Analytics and AI Association of the Philippines
articles.summary: Straits Interactive's National AI Prompt Design Challenge showcased several new AI applications developed using their Capabara platform. Noteworthy apps include Export Buddy, an AI assistant for Filipino exporters; BldgGuide PH, an AI chatbot for building code compliance; and Kuya FReady, a localized AI chatbot guiding Filipinos through government ID applications. These AI tools highlight the potential of AI to transform industries and provide accessible, user-friendly solutions.

articles.title: Pokemon Gen 10 Leaks Bring Legends: Arceus Full Circle
articles.author: Game Rant
articles.summary: Pokemon Legends: Z-A will be released on Nintendo Switch and Nintendo Switch 2. This release precedes a pause before the arrival of Pokemon Gen 10 games, expected in November of next year.

articles.title: Asus Launches NUC 15 Performance Mini-PCs Featuring Nvidia GeForce RTX 5060 and RTX 5070 GPUs
articles.author: Sophie Lin
articles.summary: Asus has launched the NUC 15 Performance series mini-PCs, featuring Nvidia GeForce RTX 5060 and RTX 5070 GPUs and Intel Core Ultra processors. This new series caters to gamers, content creators, and professionals, offering high-end capabilities in a compact form factor with configurations including up to 64GB DDR5 RAM and PCIe Gen4 NVMe SSD support.

articles.title: 40 Travel Products To Help You Get From A To B
articles.author: Rebecca O'Connell
articles.summary: Several new travel products are described, including a wireless transmitter for connecting headphones to in-flight entertainment, a vegan leather luggage tag, a universal phone holder, and Sea Bands for motion sickness.  Other products include a teeny-tiny razor, a digital luggage scale, Tide sink packs for washing clothes, and a bendy pillow. Cadence Capsules for organizing toiletries, LeakLocks Toiletry Skins for spill protection, and a travel-size Bounce wrinkle release spray, a school-inspired 4-in-1 makeup pen, a satin-lined Hairbrella, a convertible duffel bag with a garment bag lining, Munchkin snack catchers, a refillable soap dispenser, Tide To-Go pens, a portable air compressor, a universal power adapter and a travel voltage converter are also highlighted.

articles.title: Pronto's 10-minute house help pitch sparked a 3.6x valuation jump in just 90 days
articles.author: Jagmeet Singh
articles.summary: Pronto, a startup offering cleaning, laundry, and home services, secured $11 million in Series A funding led by General Catalyst and Glade Brook Capital. With existing operations in Gurugram, Pronto plans to use the funding to expand its services into Mumbai, Bengaluru, and other major cities in the next 12-18 months.

articles.title: Vivo V60 India launch today at 12PM: Leaked price, specifications and more
articles.author: India Today
articles.summary: Vivo is launching its 'Vivo V' product in India. The launch includes details on specifications and pricing.

articles.title: Drag x Drive ‚Äì Everything You Need to Know
articles.author: Gaming Bolt
articles.summary: Nintendo premiered Drag x Drive at its April Direct. The game's scope and scale initially caused confusion, but its control scheme generated interest.

articles.title: This Threshold-Climbing Robot Vacuum Overcame Every Obstacle in My Home
articles.author: CNET
articles.summary: The Dreame X50 Ultra was tested for weeks and demonstrated effective obstacle navigation and pet hair handling capabilities in a home environment.

articles.title: Dreame Just Unveiled Affordable Robot Vacuums That Can Climb Over the Threshold Between Rooms. I ...
articles.author: CNET
articles.summary: Dreame introduced a new product lineup. This lineup incorporates premium features such as threshold crossing.

articles.title: Naughty Dog's new game Intergalactic getting close to launch suggests job ad
articles.author: Metro UK
articles.summary: Apple is seeking a leader for new health initiatives. The role emphasizes experience with new product introduction and driving product requirements, suggesting the imminent introduction of a new health-related product or service.

articles.title: Claude AI Can Now Search And Reference Past ConversationsÔªø
articles.author: BGR
articles.summary: Anthropic has started rolling out its new 'Search and reference chats' feature for Claude across web, desktop, and mobile platforms. The company explains how the personalization of the feature works.

articles.title: T-Mobile Introduces New Revvl 8 Smartphone Packed with Power and Perks
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: T-Mobile launched the all-new T-Mobile Revvl 8 smartphone. This is the latest addition in its Revvl series.

articles.title: Henry Halfhead - Official Release Date Trailer
articles.author: Game Rant
articles.summary: Lululu Entertainment developed the sandbox adventure game "Henry Halfhead". A release date trailer for the game has been launched.

articles.title: LG to Introduce the Next Evolution in Portable TVs with the Upcoming Launch of StanbyME 2 in the Gulf Region
articles.author: Al Bawaba
articles.summary: LG Electronics will launch the StanbyME 2, its new portable lifestyle TV.

articles.title: Nordstrom Rack has the cheapest deals on walking shoes from Brooks, Ryka, ASICS & more, ...
articles.author: Lehigh Valley
articles.summary: Nordstrom Rack is offering new deals on walking shoes, potentially as a summer promotion or new service offering.

articles.title: Monzed Launches AI Development Platform to Help Startups, Founders, and Enterprises Win the Technology Race
articles.author: Get News
articles.summary: Monzed launches a new 'Development-as-a-Service' platform. The platform delivers custom software and websites in days. This empowers organizations and individuals to innovate and automate at scale.

articles.title: Taco Bell Finally Confirms Arrival of Highly Anticipated, 'Amazing' New Mountain Dew Flavor
articles.author: The Capital Journal
articles.summary: Mountain Dew launched an exclusive new flavor. The new flavor is available as a soda and a Freeze.

articles.title: YouTube to use AI for age verification in new test
articles.author: Qatar Tribune
articles.summary: YouTube is testing a new feature on Wednesday. This feature is to improve user experience.

articles.title: Vidsoul Launches to Offer a Superior Pixverse AI Experience Within an All-in-One Multi-Model Ecosystem
articles.author: Nasdaq Globe Newswire
articles.summary: Vidsoul has officially launched its AI creation hub. The hub integrates over a dozen models, including Pixverse AI and Google Veo.
